snippet.title: LunarLux - Official Trailer | Re-MIX Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Embark on an adventure in LunarLux, and take a look at combat and more in this trailer for the upcoming sci-fi action-adventure RPG set on the Moon in the year 30XX. In LunarLux, join Bella in a story of science, truth, justice, and trust as she travels the silver globe to find a way to save humanity from Comet Coda. LunarLux will be available on PC, and a Kickstarter is coming soon.
